itemID.description: Unique identifier to represent the item

name.description: What the item is called in-game

rarity.description: Internal ID for the item's rarity. See HelperFunctions.js

progression.description: Represents the stage in progression the item can be found in. See HelperFunctions.js

defence.description: Number of defence points the item gives

effect.description: Vanity effect the item gives, not stat bonuses
